BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Technology.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Technology

Items.MatterName: Establishing timelines for the approval of permits and expanding real time tracking of pending permits.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the creation of a centralized system for processing freedom of information law requests
